fields.name: To Forsake Fortune (C2)
fields.value: Increases Grass Ring of Sanctification's duration by three seconds

fields.name: To Sequester Sorrow (C3)
fields.value: Increases Sanctifying Ring's level by three

fields.name: To Sever Sealing (C4)
fields.value: If a character with the Grass Ring active hits opponents with a normal, plunging, or charged attack, it applies a Thundergrass Mark to the foe, which deals Electro AoE damage equal to 9.7% of Shinobu's max HP

fields.name: To Cease Courtesies (C5)
fields.value: Increases Kariyama Rite's level by three

fields.name: To Ward Weakness (C6)
fields.value:
When Kuki Shinobu takes damage that would reduce her HP to 0, she will not be knocked out. The effect triggers when her HP reaches 1 and can only occur once every 60 seconds.
When Shinobu's HP drops below 25%, her Elemental Mastery increases by 150 for 15 seconds. This also can only occur once every 60 seconds.
